# This Python 3 environment comes with many helpful analytics libraries installed
# It is defined by the kaggle/python Docker image: https://github.com/kaggle/docker-python
# For example, here's several helpful packages to load

import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
import seaborn as sns 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

f,ax=plt.subplots(figsize=(12,12))
sns.heatmap(data.corr(), annot=True, linewidths=.5, fmt='.1f', ax=ax)

source.6d9616a0:
#line plots
data.Open.plot(kind='line', color='g', label='Open', linewidth=4, alpha=0.5, grid=True, linestyle='-')
data.Close.plot(kind='line', color='r', label='Close', linewidth=2, alpha=1, grid=True, linestyle='--')
plt.legend(loc='upper right')
plt.xlabel('x axis')
plt.ylabel('y axis')
plt.title('Open & Close')
plt.show()
source.f85bf4b3:
#line plots
data.Open.plot(kind='line', color='g', label='Open', linewidth=4, alpha=1, grid=True, linestyle='-')
data.High.plot(kind='line', color='r', label='High', linewidth=2, alpha=0.5, grid=True, linestyle='--')
plt.legend(loc='upper right')
plt.xlabel('open')
plt.ylabel('high')
plt.title('Open & High')
plt.show()
source.6f07c260:
data.Open.plot(kind='line', color='g', label='Open', linewidth=4, alpha=1, grid=True, linestyle='-')
data.Weighted_Price.plot(kind='line', color='r', label='Weighted_Price', linewidth=2, alpha=1, grid=True, linestyle='--')
plt.legend(loc='upper left')
plt.xlabel('Open')
plt.ylabel('Weighted_Price')
plt.title('Open & Price')
plt.show()
source.5d87205e: 8 kolondan (timestamp, open, high, low, close, volume_(BTC), volume_(Currency), weighted_Price) oluşan ve toplamda 4572257 adet entry girilmiş bir notebook.float65(7) ve int64(1) olmak üzere iki adet data tipi vardır.
source.f6073eb2:
1 ve 1'e yakın çıkarsa pozitif correlation, -1 ve -1'e yakın çıkarsa negatif correlation var demektir. O çıkması durumunda aralarında bir ilişki olmadığını gösterir.
Mesela weighted_price değer open, high, low, close ile arasında pozitif correlation bulunmaktadır.
